announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 1st June, 2025. Offertory will be led by Monday borns and Sacred Heart of Jesus Confraternity. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.

announcements.details: Registration for UCMAS which is a child brain development programme is ongoing. Kindly register your child for a training in concentration, self-confidence and all-round academic proficiency. Contact 0242146843 to register.
